<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cache of mapping from node ids (for RefNodes) to the containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic blocks. Not computing it each time for each node reduces</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the liveness calculation time by a large fraction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;NodeId, MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> NBMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi information:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RealUseMap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// map: NodeId -&gt; (map: RegisterId -&gt; NodeRefSet)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      phi id -&gt; (map: register -&gt; set of reached non-phi uses)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;NodeId, RefMap&gt;</a> RealUseMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Inverse iterated dominance frontier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, std::set&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;&gt; IIDF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live on entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, RefMap&gt; PhiLON;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi uses are considered to be located at the end of the block that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they are associated with. The reaching def of a phi use dominates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block that the use corresponds to, but not the block that contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the phi itself. To include these uses in the liveness propagation (up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the dominator tree), create a map: block -&gt; set of uses live on exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, RefMap&gt; PhiLOX;</span></CodeLine>
